attributes.action: Pay off all mortgages to free up disposable income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the mortgages were paid off by the government even as a one year payment holiday, this would free up a lot of disposable income which would be fed back into the banks and allow the consumer to purchase and therefore help the economy.
This approach would be far cheaper than using the tax payers money.
